title: Compiler "missing return at end of function" - Wrong file/line given
body:
by **seanalexprice**: 
Go Version: go1.1.2 windows/amd64
Windows 8

When I attempt run/build the project, the compiler states that a function is missing a
return at the first line of file "models/hand.go".  But the return is actually
missing at the end of "models/game.go".

This was pretty easy to spot in my larger project because I just figured it would
logically be found in the file preceding it.  What's interesting is if I place a new
line in at the bottom of "models/game.go", it will correctly identify the file
and line number for the missing return.

The attached project is broken down to simply reproduce the problem.

Compiler message:
"hand.go:1: missing return at end of function"
Attachments: 1. bugreport.zip (2404 bytes)
